message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested but $120 is a bit steep for me. How about $75?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on 90?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $90 is still a bit high.  How about $82?  It's closer to my budget, and I'm sure you'll still make a profit.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at 87? It's the highest I'm willing to go.
